tool_description: Compares land use patterns across different time periods, jurisdictions, or scenarios to identify trends and changes.
error_messages: Data length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length.
Invalid dates: Dates must be valid ISO 8601 format and baseline_date should be earlier than comparison_date.
Invalid change threshold: Threshold must be between 0 and 100.
Duplicate parcel identifiers: Each parcel identifier must be unique.
Insufficient data: At least one parcel required for comparison analysis.
usage: Provide baseline_data and comparison_data arrays with corresponding dates and parcel_identifiers. Set change_threshold to filter significant changes. The tool identifies land use transitions and trends.

total_changes.description: Number of parcels that changed land use

most_common_transitions.description: Most frequent land use change patterns

net_change_summary.description: Summary of overall land use trends
